metadata.title: CVE-2022-48782 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  mctp: fix use after free  Clang static analysis reports this problem route.c:425:4: warning: Use of memory after it is freed   trace_mctp_key_acquire(key);   ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ When mctp_key_add() fails, key is freed but then is later used in trace_mctp_key_acquire().  Add an else statement to use the key only when mctp_key_add() is successful.
